defaults.sectionText: This is a section, and inside of it you can place choices.    On both Sections and Choices, Requirements can be placed, which will block a  Section from being shown or make the player unable to select a choice,  respectively.

pageItems.title: Perks
pageItems.text: Pick any Perks you would like.

choices.title: Forever Memory
choices.text:
You now have perfect memory. You will never forget a
memory. This works retroactively too.

choices.title: Body of Atlas
choices.text:
You have unlimited stamina. You can lift up to 50 million
times more than a regular human.

choices.title: Avalon
choices.text:
Your body's healing is greater than anyone before you.
You regenerate nigh-instantly.

pageItems.title: Second row
pageItems.text: This is my second row. Teehee!
